title: Chum
text:
[subroutine] The next piece of ice the Runner encounters during this run has +2 strength. When that encounter ends, if the Runner did not break all subroutines on that ice, do 3 net damage.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.2</errata>
You have 1 additional [click] to spend each turn.
title: Mandatory Upgrades
